title:
LK 2 Pack for Google Pixel 8 Screen Protector with 2 Pack Camera Lens Protector, HD Ultra-thin, 9H Hardness Tempered Glass Screen Protector for Pixel 8; fingerprint Compatible; Military-grade shatterproof; screen protection and camera lens protection;
original visual experience; high-response haptic touch
descriptions:
LK 2 Pack Screen Protector for Google Pixel 8 with 2 Pack Camera Lens Protector

Protect your Google Pixel 8 with military‑grade tempered glass that preserves clarity, touch, and style. This LK bundle includes two ultra‑thin 9H tempered glass screen protectors and two 9H tempered glass camera lens protectors, plus all installation accessories for a quick, bubble‑free setup.

Key features:
- Made for Pixel 8: Precision cut for full display coverage and camera fit, maintaining original visual quality.
- 9H tempered glass: Military‑grade shatterproof protection resists scratches, drops, and daily wear.
- Ultra‑thin, high definition: Crystal‑clear transparency keeps colors vibrant and sharp.
- Smooth, responsive touch: High‑response haptic touch for seamless swipes and taps; compatible with fingerprint features.
- Edge strengthening design: Reinforced edges help prevent chips and cracks from side impacts.
- Camera lens protection: 9H glass shields lenses from scratches and shattering without affecting photo quality.
- Easy installation: Includes cleaning kit and alignment tools for a bubble‑free, case‑friendly fit.
- Lifetime service: Backed by LK’s lifetime support with responses typically within 24 hours.

What’s in the box:
- 2x Tempered Glass Screen Protectors (Pixel 8)
- 2x Tempered Glass Camera Lens Protectors
- Installation accessories (cleaning wipes, dust removers, alignment tools)

Compatibility:
- Google Pixel 8 only.

Give your Pixel 8 reliable, crystal‑clear protection front and back—without compromising touch sensitivity or camera performance.
